remarks: The given function is integrable .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem18.s $e |- ( ph -> RR e. { RR , CC } ) $.
etransclem18.x $e |- ( ph -> RR e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t RR ) ) $.
etransclem18.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem18.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem18.f $e |- F = ( x e. RR |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem18.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
etransclem18.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
etransclem18 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A (,) B ) |-> ( ( _e ^c -u x ) x. ( F ` x ) ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d M j x $.
$d P j x $.
$d j ph x $.
